about_the_game:
When Chuck wears this incredibly cool outfit, he gains the power of the legendary Japanese ninja!

With this costume equipped, Chuck will be harder for zombies to grapple and can move through crowds of zombies easier. He will also gain new sword attacks, and throwing weapons (plates, nails, CDs, etc) fly farther and do more damage. Why? Because he is dressed like a ninja!
